title: Bookjacket Design, "Bookjacket for "Artists & Enemies, 3 Novellas" by Arthur A. Cohen", 1986
medium: Lithography in red, blue and black ink on tan wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on back cover in lower left in red ink: Jacket desifn by Elaine Lustig Cohen
On front cover diagonally in left center in black ink: ARTISTS &/ ENEMIES/ 3/NOVELLAS/ Arthur A. Cohen
Down the center of spine vertically in black ink: ARTISTS & ENEMIES ARTHUR A. COHEN
Horizontally on spine: GODINE
On back cover in lower left in black ink: DAVID R. GODINE, PUBLISHERS INC./ Horticultural Hall/ 300 Massachusetts Avenue/ Boston, MA. 02115
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Book cover for "Artists & Enemies." On the right side of the cover is the title, author and a synopsis of the book and author's credentials. This continues onto the back cover, which also has a picture of the author. On the back cover are reviews of the book under a heading of words for Arthur Cohen. On the spine and back cover where the publisher is referenced, their logo DRG inside a square accompanies the words.

tombstone.epitaph: Bookjacket Design, "Bookjacket for "Artists & Enemies, 3 Novellas" by Arthur A. Cohen", 1986.Lithography in red, blue and black ink on tan wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-61.
